channel.title: News on Better Tomorrow with Computer Science
channel.description: Recent content in News on Better Tomorrow with Computer Science

item.title: Internship at Tesla in Summer 2023
item.description: I am going to work as an Intern at Tesla Autopilot Infrastructure team. Can’t wait to experience and work on large scale supercomputers that I have never seen before!

item.title: Changed Blog Theme
item.description: Changed blog theme to Congo. Thanks James Panther for making a good theme!
